segments.text: I notice the water running over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy struggling to balance on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on the cookie jar, he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her share, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should pay more attention to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a mess, and it's only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the dishes stacked neatly by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame that the scene is so chaotic otherwise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this could have been avoided with a bit more care.
segments.speaker: PAR
